display_information.description: Run /channel or /here to do a @channel/@here ping!
display_information.long_description:
Run /channel or /here to do a @channel/@here ping!
You'll need to be a channel manager to run the commands.

Closed source: DM @skyfall for repo access

shortcuts.name: Delete this message

slash_commands.description: Allows the mentioned person to ping.
Removes the mentioned person's ability ping.
